Name: Helix I Mining Laser
Description:
Manufacturer: Thermyte Concern
Item Type: Mining Laser 
Size: 1

Optimal Range: 37.5m
Maximum Range: 187.5m

Power Transfer: 2300
Instability: -30%
Resistance: -10%
All Charge Rates: +20%
Optimal Charge Window Size: +15%
Shatter Damage: +50%
Throttle Responsiveness Delay: -50%

Extraction Throughput: 0.50 SCU/s
Module Slots: 3

Thermyte Concern engineered the Helix I to be a mining laser with impressive power and increased range to make it ideal when dealing with difficult deposits. Yet, all this power can be dangerous, as it also slows the throttle's responsiveness and increases the intensity of explosions. To some, the effective use of the Helix I has become a sign of a true mining professional.
